languages.text: "И, наконец, Даргонус обладает собственным флотом — роскошью, недоступной подавляющему большинству иных миров в ваших владениях. Помимо боевых кораблей в распоряжении протектората находятся также каперские суда, используемые для перевозки грузов между мирами".

traits.locale_text: "И, наконец, Даргонус обладает собственным флотом — роскошью, недоступной подавляющему большинству иных миров в ваших владениях. Помимо боевых кораблей в распоряжении торговой империи находятся также каперские суда, используемые для перевозки грузов между мирами".

languages.text: "And lastly, Dargonus has its own fleet — a luxury unavailable to the vast majority of other worlds in your realm. In addition to warships, the protectorate also employs privateer ships which are used to transport cargo between worlds."
languages.original_text: "И, наконец, Даргонус обладает собственным флотом — роскошью, недоступной подавляющему большинству иных миров в ваших владениях. Помимо боевых кораблей в распоряжении протектората находятся также каперские суда, используемые для перевозки грузов между мирами".

traits.locale_text: "And lastly, Dargonus has its own fleet — a luxury unavailable to the vast majority of other worlds in your realm. In addition to battleships, the trade empire also employs privateer vessels which are used to transport cargo between worlds."

"And lastly, Dargonus has its own fleet — a luxury unavailable to the vast majority of other worlds in your realm. In addition to battleships, the trade empire also employs privateer vessels which are used to transport cargo between worlds."

"And lastly, Dargonus has its own fleet — a luxury unavailable to the vast majority of other worlds in your realm. In addition to battleships, the trade empire also employs privateer vessels which are used to transport cargo between worlds."

"And lastly, Dargonus has its own fleet — a luxury unavailable to the vast majority of other worlds in your realm. In addition to battleships, the trade empire also employs privateer vessels which are used to transport cargo between worlds."

"And lastly, Dargonus has its own fleet — a luxury unavailable to the vast majority of other worlds in your realm. In addition to warships, the protectorate also employs privateer ships which are used to transport cargo between worlds."

languages.text: “还有最后一件事情，达戈努斯有自己的舰队。您的王朝绝大多数其他世界都没有这样的奢侈品。除了战舰之外，王朝还雇佣了私人舰船，用来在各个世界之间运输货物。”
languages.original_text: "And lastly, Dargonus has its own fleet — a luxury unavailable to the vast majority of other worlds in your realm. In addition to warships, the protectorate also employs privateer ships which are used to transport cargo between worlds."

traits.locale_text: “还有最后一件事情，达戈努斯有自己的舰队。您的王朝绝大多数其他世界都没有这样的奢侈品。除了战舰之外，王朝还雇佣了私人舰船，用来在各个世界之间运输货物。”

languages.text: «Por último, Dargonus tiene flota propia, un lujo del que la mayoría de mundos de sus dominios no dispone. Además de naves de guerra, el protectorado emplea naves privadas para transportar carga de un planeta a otro».
languages.original_text: "And lastly, Dargonus has its own fleet — a luxury unavailable to the vast majority of other worlds in your realm. In addition to warships, the protectorate also employs privateer ships which are used to transport cargo between worlds."

traits.locale_text: «Por último, Dargonus tiene flota propia, un lujo del que la mayoría de mundos de sus dominios no dispone. Además de naves de batalla, el protectorado emplea naves privadas para transportar carga de un planeta a otro».

languages.text: 「最後に、ダルゴナスは独自に艦隊を所有しています。陛下の領域にある他の多くの惑星では持つことのできないほど豪勢なものです。戦艦に加え、惑星間の貨物輸送に使用する私掠船も使用しています」
languages.original_text: "And lastly, Dargonus has its own fleet — a luxury unavailable to the vast majority of other worlds in your realm. In addition to warships, the protectorate also employs privateer ships which are used to transport cargo between worlds."

traits.locale_text: 「最後に、ダルゴナスは独自に艦隊を所有しています。陛下の領域にある他の多くの惑星では持つことのできないほど豪勢なものです。戦艦に加え、惑星間の貨物輸送に使用する私掠船も使用しています」

languages.text: "Und schließlich hat Dargonus noch eine eigene Flotte – ein Luxus, der den meisten anderen Welten in Eurem Reich nicht zur Verfügung steht. Neben Kriegsschiffen beschäftigt das Protektorat auch Freibeuter, die Fracht zwischen den Welten transportieren."
languages.original_text: "And lastly, Dargonus has its own fleet — a luxury unavailable to the vast majority of other worlds in your realm. In addition to warships, the protectorate also employs privateer ships which are used to transport cargo between worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Und schließlich hat Dargonus noch eine eigene Flotte – ein Luxus, der den meisten anderen Welten in Eurem Reich nicht zur Verfügung steht. Neben Schlachtschiffen beschäftigt das Protektorat auch Freibeuter, die Fracht zwischen den Welten transportieren."

languages.text: « Enfin, Dargonus dispose de sa propre flotte de vaisseaux, un luxe que très peu de mondes peuvent se permettre dans votre royaume. En plus des vaisseaux de guerre, le protectorat fait appel à des corsaires pour le transport de marchandises entre les mondes. »
languages.original_text: "And lastly, Dargonus has its own fleet — a luxury unavailable to the vast majority of other worlds in your realm. In addition to warships, the protectorate also employs privateer ships which are used to transport cargo between worlds."

traits.locale_text: « Enfin, Dargonus dispose de sa propre flotte de vaisseaux, un luxe que très peu de mondes peuvent se permettre dans votre royaume. En plus des cuirassés, le protectorat fait appel à des corsaires pour le transport de marchandises entre les mondes. »

languages.text: "Son olarak da Dargonus'un kendi filosu mevcut. Egemenlik alanınızdaki diğer dünyaların çoğunun böyle bir lüksü yok. Savaş gemilerine ek olarak protektoranız, dünyalar arasında kargo nakliyatı yapma izni bulunan hususi ticaret gemilerine de sahip."
languages.original_text: "And lastly, Dargonus has its own fleet — a luxury unavailable to the vast majority of other worlds in your realm. In addition to warships, the protectorate also employs privateer ships which are used to transport cargo between worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Son olarak da Dargonus'un kendi filosu mevcut. Egemenlik alanınızdaki diğer dünyaların çoğunun böyle bir lüksü yok. Savaş gemilerine ek olarak, protektoranız ayrıca dünyalar arasında kargo nakliyatı için izinli, hususi ticaret gemilerden de faydalanır."
